.: Plot :.
Beauty and the Beast will be loosely based on the 1987 CBS series starring Ron Pearlman and Linda Hamilton.
Jennifer Levin and Sherri Cooper will write and executive-produce alongside Paul J. Witt and C. Anthony Thomas, Ron Koslow and Bill Haber. ABC is also developing a Beauty and the Beast project, planned as a more traditional take about Belle being imprisoned by the Beast in his enchanted castle.[/b]
